text: Nightmare Alley is a 1947 American crime drama movie directed by Edmund Goulding and was based on the 1946 novel of the same name by William Lindsay Gresham. It stars Tyrone Power, Joan Blondell, Coleen Gray, Helen Walker, Ian Keith, Taylor Holmes and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1947 crime drama movies Category:1940s American crime drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Edmund Goulding
title: Nightmare Alley (movie)
